7001.name: Iron Claw
7001.effect: Slash the opponent with a harden claw. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

7002.name: Bullet Punch
7002.effect: Deliver a fast punch with bullet-like speed. This move has a +1 priority.

7003.name: Iron Tail
7003.effect: Slam the opponent with a steel-hard tail. This move has a 20% chance of reducing the target's Defense stat by one stage.

7004.name: Steel Wing
7004.effect: Strike the opponent with hard, steel wings. This move has a 10% chance of raising the user's Attack stat.

7005.name: Power Ball
7005.effect: Roll towards the opponent like a powerball. If it misses, the user is hurt instead for 25% of the maximum HP.

7006.name: Heavy Bash
7006.effect: Bash the target heavily with a harden body part. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

7007.name: Heavy Slam
7007.effect: Slam into the target with a heavy body. The more the user outweights the target, the greater the move's power.

7008.name: Steel Crusher
7008.effect: Crush the opponent with a force that can bend steel. This move has 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

7009.name: Steel Blade
7009.effect: Slash the target with a blade of steel. This move has a 20% chance of landing a critial hit.

7010.name: Iron Spike
7010.effect: Strike the opponent with a sharp iron spike. This move has a 10% chance of causing the target to flinch.

7011.name: Comet Smash
7011.effect: Hit the target with a powerful, comet-like punch. This move has a 20% chance of raising the user's Attack stat.

7012.name: Magnet Bomb
7012.effect: Launch a magnetic bomb that never misses.

7013.name: Steel Scraps
7013.effect: Hurl sharp steel scraps at the opponent. The target will take 50% of the damage one more time on the next turn.

7014.name: Iron Shot
7014.effect: Fire a projectile of molten iron at the target. This move has a 10% chance of burning the target.

7015.name: Steel Surge
7015.effect: Blast the target with a wave of sharp steel energy. This move has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Special Defense stat.

7016.name: Metal Burst
7016.effect: Unlease a burst of damaged metal parts. This move hits both foes and allies alike, with a 10% chance of lowering the targets' Speed stat.

7017.name: Lustre Cannon
7017.effect: Fire a burst of light energy from steel. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Special Defense. After using the move, the user's Special Attack will be lowered.

7018.name: Meteor Shower
7018.effect: Summon a rain of meteors onto the opposing field. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Special Attack stat.

7019.name: Iron Wall
7019.effect: Harden the body like an iron wall to sharply raise the user's Defense stat.

7020.name: Chompers
7020.effect: Set a trap with iron chompers. All non-Metal typed opponents will take damage when switching in.

7021.name: Gear Up
7021.effect: Enhance the user's gear. This move raises the user's Attack and Special Attack stats.

7022.name: Gear Grind
7022.effect: Hit the target with rotating gears. This move strikes twice.
